Reviews.Content: 1st step dont complain looks tidy clean price paid 100day couldnt accept 3 1 bath mat wet feet dry bath 2 blanket extremely thin freezing night aircond 25 degree 3 mattress wrapped pvc hard

Reviews.Title: “If you have no other choice.....this one will do.”
Reviews.Author: ktine203
Reviews.Content: booked bedroom 2 single beds queen size bed ok hotel initially windows elevator claustrophobic upgraded family 1 double bed 1 single bed family meter bigger regular initially assigned window cleanliness ok improve lot comfort realized fast turnout guests coming couples walls pretty thin soundproof traffic outside hotel located near main road hear traffic outside heard doors noises laughter talking talking book bring earplugs bring airfreshner guess time month nose awfully sensitive halls smell musky airing cost bit unreasonable considering backpackers hostel

Reviews.Title: “Terrible & Horrible Hotel Service Staff - Ida”
Reviews.Author: shahroh
Reviews.Content: worst experience hotel service staff named miss ida totally unprofessional rude incompetent staff ver service inconsiderate treatment hotel guests stay totally unpleasant recommend else dont waste time money hotel definitely value hotel rates dont bother return lowclass hotel discourteous staff

Reviews.Title: “Small but clean”
Reviews.Author: goodgirlbadgirl
Reviews.Content: boked hotel cheap family location strategic receptionist help luggage checkin time arrived singapore proceed sentosa manage clean despite hotel breakfast nights slightly motel couples luckily nephew nieces didnt tired outing convenient budget travellers sleep ok splurge food activities sentosa vivo city

Reviews.Title: “Convenient but not comfortable”
Reviews.Author: TravelMomma7
Reviews.Content: stayed husband convention nearby resorts world sentosa chose sg 1 bus ride vivo city sg 68 cab resort world casino convention universal staff helpful price expected comfort im talking huge dont expect fragrance hotels nor budget hotels budget hotel wasnt budget sg 370 3 nights beds hard pillows staff replace pillows softer set apologized pillows exhausted coming night dozed anyway wished fluffier blanket comforter ill recommend convenience location
